summary: "The Boondocks" is an American animated sitcom created by Aaron McGruder for Adult Swim. It's based on his comic strip and follows the Black Freeman family moving to a mostly White suburb called Woodcrest. The show uses this cultural mix to make jokes and comment on society. It ran from 2005 to 2014 with 55 episodes. "The Boondocks" won many awards and was popular worldwide. A reboot was planned but later canceled.
title: The Boondocks (TV series)
